code: import{UnavailabilityError}from'expo-modules-core';import Sharing from'./ExpoSharing';export async function isAvailableAsync(){if(Sharing){if(Sharing.isAvailableAsync){return await Sharing.isAvailableAsync();}return true;}return false;}export async function shareAsync(url,options={}){if(!Sharing||!Sharing.shareAsync){throw new UnavailabilityError('Sharing','shareAsync');}return await Sharing.shareAsync(url,options);}
